VEC.Q: How many ring layers are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in this sunburst chart?

SRP.Q: Is Applied Sciences positioned outside, inside or on the same side as Computer Science?
SRP.A: Applied Sciences is positioned {inside} Computer Science.

VPR.A: The top-level category with the highest proportion is {Life Sciences}.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Life Sciences, Biology, Applied Sciences, or Physical Sciences?
NC.A: The value of {Life Sciences} is the largest.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Biology, Applied Sciences, or Computer Science?
NC.A: The value of {Computer Science} is smaller.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Physical Sciences to Physics to Mechanics}.
